entry.title: Trump Narrowly Leads Biden in Key State of Pennsylvania: Poll
entry.summary: According to the Quinnipiac poll, Trump also maintains a sizable lead against his challengers for the Republican presidential nomination.

entry.summary: A couple millennia after Athens and a couple hundred years after the modern democratic revolution, Russia still has a de facto czar.

entry.title: Five Years after Janus, Government Unions Are Weaker ‚Äî and More Desperate
entry.summary: The Supreme Court ruling did not end the influence of unions, but it did push them deeper into social militancy and away from working for workers.

entry.title: R Weekly 2023-W26 Table to Markdown, Model Sharing, and Rhub debugging
entry.summary: Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This week‚Äôs release was curated by , with help from the R Weekly team members and contributors. Highlight Convert a Word table to Markdown How Can Someone Else Use My Model? How to debug your package in a {rhub} fedora container before sending to CRAN? Insights In Survivor is entering the merge down on numbers a disadvantage? Student‚Äôs t-test explained with R and Pokemon R in the Real World Data4Good Explores Visualizing Freshwater Resources on a Global Scale New Packages üì¶ Go Live for More New Pkgs üì¶ CRAN RcppArmadillo 0.12.4.1.0 on CRAN: New Upstream Bugfix survivoR 2.1.0 is now available Updated Packages üîç Search on R-universe üîç Videos and Podcasts Listen to the R-Weekly Highlights Podcast Gist & Cookb‚Ä¶

entry.title: Antony Blinken: Wagner Rebellion Shows How Far Russia Has Fallen Since Invading Ukraine
entry.summary: According to the secretary of state, the aggression against Ukraine has become a strategic failure across the board.

entry.title: The Land of the (Almost) Midnight Sun
entry.summary: A photo journal from Oslo.

entry.title: The Lost Art of Album Art
entry.summary: Looking back at pop culture we had in common.

entry.title: Broader Scope for Conservation Leasing Would Improve Federal Land Management
entry.summary: The current proposal for conservation leasing can be improved to make it a more viable and valuable program.

entry.title: The Titan Disaster Shows the Allure and Terror of the Sea
entry.summary: The quests for adventure, profit, survival, and freedom have long motivated nautical undertakings, and insane risk-taking has often been part of the bargain.

entry.title: One Year Ago, Dobbs Gave New Life to the Pro-Life Movement, but We Can‚Äôt Quit Now
entry.summary: The ruling did not end abortion in our nation, and those of us who stand for life still have a lot of work to do to make abortion unthinkable, not just illegal.

entry.title: Dobbs Turns One
entry.summary: The laws that have taken effect after the decision have very likely already saved tens of thousands of human lives.

entry.title: Brawls, Theft, Drugs: How Rampant Crime Turned Westfield Mall into a Symbol of San Francisco‚Äôs Decline
entry.summary: Police have been called to the mall over 5,000 times over the last three years, according to data obtained by NR.

entry.title: R Weekly 2023-W25 slice(), columns, Bayes
entry.summary:
Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This week‚Äôs release was curated by Jonathan Carroll, with help from the RWeekly team members and contributors. Highlight Row relational operations with slice() Merging columns together and fixing up column labels in {gt} 0.9.0 Bayes Lived Here (Probably) Insights Step By Step: recreating a volcano plot in R Bayesian structural equation model tutorial My Computer Can Read!

entry.title: Former NYC Mayor Bill de Blasio Hit with Nearly $500K Conflict-of-Interest Fine
entry.summary: The former mayor has pledged to appeal the ruling.
